Beaverton.KKRZ:
KKRZ is a commercial broadcast radio station in Portland, Oregon, also known as Z100, broadcasts Top 40 (CHR) music. Owned by iHeartMedia, the transmitter is located in Portland's West Hills; their studios are in Tigard, Oregon.


== History ==
What is now KKRZ first signed on May 7, 1946 as KGW-FM on 95.3 MHz and moved to 100.3 MHz on September 22, 1947.
